post_detail.title: I Am Owen Corso
post_detail.description:
I am passionately driven to craft digital experiences in new and exciting ways. I am innovative and creative, and apply these qualities to my work and play.

I work at Amazon Web Services as a Product Manager on the AWS Cost Management team.

I previously worked at Google as a Creative Technical Consultant within Media & Technology Solutions. Prior to Google, I worked at a New York City based digital production studio called Click 3X. In my role as Lead Technologist, I exercised my technological acumen by using a variety of programs to accomplish client objectives. I applied my creative nature by playing a role in designing projects and finding innovative ways to bring them to life.

Music is another outlet for my creative energy. I lead a NYC rock band called Red Machine. I compose original music and lyrics, and perform on guitar and lead vocals.

I am also an athlete. I play in various menâ€™s lacrosse leagues throughout the year as a take-away long stick midfielder. I am and avid mountain biker, and I love to ski.

I grew up in northern New Jersey as the youngest of four boys. I continue to be motivated by my amazing mother, who raised us alone and with very little. In 2003, I earned a BS in Computer Science from Villanova University.

I am currently a resident of New York City. Living in this vibrant city gives me access to inspiring experiences and fuels my creative energy. I recently moved from the San Francisco Bay Area and worked in Silcon Valley which meant I was able to play a role in a constantly evolving start-up community. I embrace all opportunities to learn and to create.
